alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Sequoia NP; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:21PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL TULARE COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM PDT... At 419 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm north of Springville and southeast of Three Rivers moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail, and isolated heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall could lead to nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers and South Fork Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Sequoia NP; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra
